# Index of Elixir Library llms.txt files
> Index of llms.txt files for common Elixir libraries.

## Libraries
* [Phoenix Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/libs/phoenix/llms.txt): Index for Phoenix framework best practices and guides.
* [Phoenix LiveView](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/libs/phoenix_live_view/llms.txt): Best practices and guides for Phoenix LiveView.
